short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This launcher is for enhancing your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
One stop destination for your productivity issues.
This chrome extension covers most of your productivity issue.
It has focus mode which helps the user to focus on their work by prohibiting them to not open few web pages like instagram, facebook and netflix. 
It also comes with the focus music which the user can run in the background to stay focus.
Be motivated! It also pushes the motivational quotes every half an hour if you turned on this feature in the motivation  section.
Protect your eyes, it reminds the user to protect their eyes by sending a popup at every 20 minutes to look away from the computer screen. 
The user can very easily add the alarm and timer for their other chores.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_C:
One stop destination for your productivity issues.
This chrome extension packs most of the productivity issue
